themes: lack of communication about funding changes
key_phrases: only funding artists/groups who are active within the Austin city limits
eliminating funding opportunities without warning for long-serving arts groups
hurts the arts community and the artists who depend on them
let them know ahead of time they are not eligible
wasting valuable time and resources of people who volunteer their time for the community, or work for minimal wages
barriers_identified: lack of advance notice of ineligibility
wasted time and resources for applicants
solutions_proposed: only fund artists/groups active within Austin city limits
provide advance notice to groups that are no longer eligible for funding
